dict.string: (?x) ( (\}|\))(,|;)? # Openstep foldings .*$ # limit false positives | (^\s*(</[^>]+>|/>|-->)\s*$) # XML )
This gives us the proper scope for the xml or plist snippet.
This gives us the proper scope for the convert plist command.
Mark anything between the name and the = as invalid.
the extra captures are required to duplicate the effect of the namespace parsing in the XML syntax
